verse: गंगा गंगेति यो ब्रूयाद्योजनानां शतैरपि \nमुच्यते सर्वपापेभ्यो विष्णुलोकं स गच्छति

terms.गंगा: Ganga (Name of a river in India, symbolizing purity and divinity)

meaning: Meaning:Whoever utters the name "Ganga" (referring to the sacred river) even from a distance of thousands or hundreds of yojanas (a unit of distance), they get liberated from all sins and attain the realm of Vishnu (heavenly abode).
